summary: Semi-true story of the Hollywood murder that occurred at a star-studded gathering aboard William Randolph Hearst's yacht in 1924.
cast: Kirsten Dunst|Edward Herrmann|Eddie Izzard|Cary Elwes|Joanna Lumley|Jennifer Tilly|Claudia Harrison|Victor Slezak|James Laurenson|Ronan Vibert|Chiara Schoras|Claudie Blakley|Ingrid Lacey|John C. Vennema|Steven Peros|Yuki Iwamoto|Zoi Mavroudi|Despina Mirou|Stavros Serafetinis|Soweto Kinch|Frank Dawkins|Roderick Young|Robert Mitchell|Richard Böhringer|Hendrik Arnst|Diana Agostini
title: El maullido del gato
